testimonials.name: Aza Ndoro
testimonials.description: Her commitment to learning and embracing new technologies sets her apart as a standout student in the field.

testimonials.name: Anathi Josefu
testimonials.description: Rethabile's appreciation for order is evident in every aspect of her life, from meticulously organized study materials to a well-structured approach to tasks, reflecting her commitment to efficiency and clarity.

testimonials.name: Sivelele Nkamene
testimonials.description: Rethabile's quiet diligence in our class is truly admirable; she approaches her studies with a focused determination that sets a positive example for everyone around her.

testimonials.name: Onika Sileku
testimonials.description: Rethabile is an exceptional classmate, always ready and willing to lend a helping hand to others. Her genuine willingness to assist her peers creates a positive and collaborative learning environment for everyone around her.

testimonials.name: Sisipho Mafrica
testimonials.description: Rethabile is a stellar schoolmate, seamlessly balancing academic prowess with a friendly and approachable demeanor, making her a positive presence in our school community.

testimonials.name: Sivuyisiwe Peter
testimonials.description: Rethabile, my ex-classmate from Codetelligence and now schoolmate, is a constant source of joy. Her infectious happiness brings a vibrant energy to our academic environment.
